Home Consortium Access Support Useful links

Partners

University of Oxford (Lead Partner)

University of Oxford is proud to be the Lead Partner for the JADE system and will host events in the near future to showcase the applications of JADE for both machine learning and molecular dynamics research. Prof. Mike Giles is the Principal Investigator for JADE and is resident in the Mathematical Institute.
Machine Learning and Related CDTs
  • Computer Science Machine Learning
  • Mobile robotics
  • Torr Vision Group
  • Engineering Science Machine Learning Research Group
  • Visual Geometry Group
  • Computational Statistics and Machine Learning
  • CDT in Autonomous Intelligent Machines and Systems
  • OxWaSP Statistical Program CDT
Molecular Dynamics Groups
  • Structural Bioinformatics and Computational Biochemistry Unit
  • Biggin group -- Computational Biochemistry

Principal Investigators

Professor Mike Giles
